Amiodarone monotherapy
Based on our pooled analysis, there was no significant difference in POAF incidence, hospital LOS, ICU LOS, TRDD, or mortality with prophylactic amiodarone alone compared with beta-blockers alone for the prevention of POAF, indicating equivalent efficacy and safety between amiodarone and beta-blockers as monotherapy for POAF prophylaxis.
